mutants.code:
import ctypes

class SomeClass(ctypes.Structure):
    pass

def create_objects(n):
    size = ctypes.sizeof(SomeClass)
    buffer = ctypes.create_string_buffer(n / size)
    objects = []
    for i in range(n):
        obj = SomeClass.from_address(ctypes.addressof(buffer) + i * size)
        objects.append(obj)
    return objects

import ctypes

class SomeClass(ctypes.Structure):
    pass

    size = ctypes.sizeof(SomeClass)
    buffer = ctypes.create_string_buffer(n + size)
    objects = []

        obj = SomeClass.from_address(ctypes.addressof(buffer) + i * size)
        objects.append(obj)
    return objects
